title: Thanks Riot for Pyke!
body:
I just wanted to do a shout out to Riot and whoever made Pyke. He's the first new champion I've played in a while that I've genuinely had a huge amount of fun with. They feel balanced, are easy to pick up, but still have plenty of room to grow. Especially as a support main, it makes me feel like I'm actively a threat on the map instead of just some glorified baby-sitter/ward placer that occasionally deals with toxic fights and getting flamed. I can actually go gank lanes and be cool.

Less of this "hit three times and you do X extra effect" or other lame stuff. More champions like Pyke. Fun mechanics. Cool theme. He's just fun. No one will probably see this, but thanks Riot! :)

(Thought I'd take a break from my usual rant posts haha).

replies.body: I've gotten 2 Pentas with him in the last week haha. He's such a boss in ARAM. :P

Pyke is not exciting at all, the regenerative healing out of sight is just not balanced. There are so many champions with a hook ability - he is essentially the love child of {{champion:29}}{{champion:412}} and {{champion:122}}

You could say that about many champs though. So many abilities overlap in some way. The way he's put together though is great. I feel his abilities are super powerful in a lot of ways, but in a 5v5 Rift game, his role as a support definitely requires skill or you fall behind. If you play him like a conventional support, you will fail, so that is the trade off for slightly powerful abilities imo.
